titleStmt.title: Newes concernynge the general cou[n]cell, holden at Trydent by the emperoure and the Germaynes wyth all the nobles of Hungarye, Constantinople and Rome Translated out of Germayne into Englysh by Jhon Holibush. Anno 1548.

Newes concernynge the general cou[n]cell, holden at Trydent by the emperoure and the Germaynes wyth all the nobles of Hungarye, Constantinople and Rome Translated out of Germayne into Englysh by Jhon Holibush. Anno 1548.
titleStmt.author: Hollybush, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: In saynt Andrewes paryshe in the ware dropt, by Thomas Raynalde,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
End of text dated from Augsburg, 6 December 1548.
"A letter to a friend concerning both the matters taken up at the Dict of Augsburg and matters of diplomacy".--NUC Pre-1956 Catalog.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
